was rocky during its early years, as the founders frequently undercut Mr. Eric Schmidt 's decisions. Although they worked well together for the last several years, there remained recurring strains. Ken Auletta , the author of Googled: The End of the World As We Know It, said in an interview that while Mr. Eric Schmidt may simply have been ready for a change after 10 years, he may have received some encouragement to step aside. to appoint Mr Andy Coulson in the first place after he resigned as editor of the newspaper in 2007.
